CustomField.description: If “No, I don’t want a rep to contact me” is selected, they will be logged as a contact and the activity record updated If “Yes, I want a rep to contact me”, they will still drop into the Campaign list with the activity record updated, but they will also be updated to a “lead” and go into the local rep lead queue for follow-up
CustomField.inlineHelpText: I would like to talk to my local Teleflex Representative
CustomField.label: Contact Local Teleflex Rep
